page.title: 20ECOLOGY:CREDITS:WOKINGHAM
page.content: The{climate}is mild and dry; mean annual{temperature}9.4C and mean annual{rainfall}678mm. {Ludgrove School}is an independent boarding school for boys between the ages of 8 and 14,preparing them for entrance into Public Schools. The school buildings, including a private chapel stand in the grounds of 130 acres. There is a heated indoor swimming pool. { { CREDITS} Overall co-ordinator Barry Pearse. Text author Joyce M Heywood with help from Mike Teale, Sue Baughan, Jeff Carney, Monica Hurdwell, Dorothy Cooper, Charles Hurdwell, 'Paddy' Randall, the Upper Junior Classes of St Sebastians and Oaklands School and all the local people who gave their time and information willingly to the children during interviews and telephone conversations
